item.description:
Do you like to act....be dramatic? Can you bring a character to
life? Whether you are a supsect or a detective participating in
a Murder Mystery Game can be fun for all.We do a different
mystery each month. You may be the murderer or be murdered!

These parties are a real blast, and the trippy thing is you
arrive in character, so the people you've never met before get
to meet your character first. Respond by March 21st to receive
a role as one of our charming murder suspects, or perhaps the
lucky guest of honor...the victim.

So put on your crazy outfits and step out of reality for a
while and let go of your worries.
There will be prizes awarded for best costume, best sleuth,
best actor/actress.


The contact for this event is Lori Larsen,

The event is at:

487A Campbell Ave, West Haven, CT
203-933-2200


You'll need to contact her to sign up for a role and handle the
$29.00 payment.
Because roles need to be pre-assigned, "maybe" responses have
been disabled.

Details from her site: http://www.meetup.com....
item.name: Murdery Mystery Night
